help-file.title: SMELTING
help-file.content:
Smelting is one of the skills known to the Alchemist Class. It allows you to merge pieces of ore into larger ones. This is helpful in order to fulfil the requirements needed to forge various items.
A foundry is required to smelt ore, this can be innately created by any alchemist.
To smelt ore simply follow these steps: Create a foundry. Open the forge. Put the ore you wish to smelt into the forge. Smelt the ore.
The syntax for using this skill is smelt.
Both the skill in smelting and level of the alchemist will determine how successful the outcome is. It is well known that less experienced alchemists often end up with nothing but ashes when trying to use this skill.
